GSD.description:
net: ieee802154: fix null deref in parse dev addr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.45 by commit c7836de2cadd88bc2f20f2c5a3d4ef4c73aef627. For more details please see the references link.
